Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: FabricCaTests failed in fabric-test-daily-x86_64 due to network authentication error
Issue.description: raise CalledProcessError(retcode, cmd, output=output) E CalledProcessError: Command ' 'mkdir -p /tmp/logs/FAB7206; chmod 777 /tmp/logs/FAB7206;docker run -v $PWD/../../tools/CTE/:/tmp/test -v /tmp/logs/FAB7206:/tmp -v $PWD/../../fabric-ca:/opt/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric-ca hyperledger/fabric-ca-fvt /tmp/test/crl_test.sh' ' returned non-zero exit status 5 {code} {code:java} 2018/02/03 19:00:32 INFO Configuration file location: /tmp/gencrl/notadmin/fabric-ca-client-config.yaml Error: Response from server: Error Code: 20 - Authorization failure {code} *Build Log* https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-test/job/fabric-test-daily-x86_64/245/testReport/ca_tests/FabricCaTests/test_FAB7206_GenCrlWindows/ >
